original_text: But your father has cheated me many times. He has changed what I receive for my work at least ten times. But God has protected me from him.
korean_text: 그대들의 아버지가 나를 속여 품삯을 열 번이나 변경하였느니라 그러나 하나님이 그를 막으사 나를 해치지 못하게 하셨으며

sentences.original_text: But your father has cheated me many times.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신의 아버지는 나를 여러 번 속였습니다.

sentences.original_text: He has changed what I receive for my work
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 내가 일에 대해 받는 것을 바꾸어 왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: But God has protected me from him.
